sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Family Caregiver Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings.   The General Assembly recognizes the
Legislative intent.  It is the intent of the General Assembly to
sections.text:
establish a multi-faceted family caregiver support program to assist unpaid
family caregivers and grandparents or other older individuals who are relative
caregivers, who are informal providers of in-home and community care to
older individuals or children.

sections.heading: Provision of services.  The Department shall contract with area agencies on aging and other appropriate agencies to conduct family caregiver support services to the extent of available State and federal funding
sections.text: Services provided under this Act must be provided according to the requirements of State

sections.heading: Health care practitioners and facilities not impaired. Nothing
sections.text:
